default.text: I am the recognized cross-project advocate for all things UI development in OpenStack. With hundreds of engineers contributing to our user interfaces, I ensure that we adhere to common, sane UI development standards, and that our tooling remains relevant, consistent, secure, and performant in today's rapidly evolving landscape.

OpenStack.text: I am the recognized cross-project advocate for all things UI development in OpenStack. With hundreds of engineers contributing to our user interfaces, I ensure that we adhere to common, sane UI development standards, and that our tooling remains relevant, consistent, secure, and performant in today's rapidly evolving landscape.
